name: White Sesame Seeds – Premium Export Grade
description: White sesame seeds from Chad are known for their high oil content, uniform color, and export quality. Suitable for food processing, oil extraction, and international trade.

name: Black Sesame Seeds – Natural & Healthy
description: Black sesame seeds are rich in nutrients and antioxidants, mainly used in health food products and specialty markets.

name: Gum Arabic (Acacia Senegal / Acacia Seyal)
description: Gum Arabic from Chad is a high-quality natural resin harvested from Acacia trees. It is widely used in the food, pharmaceutical, cosmetic, and beverage industries.

name: Dried Hibiscus Flowers (Whole / Cut)
description: Dried hibiscus flowers from Chad are known for their deep red color and strong aroma. Highly demanded for tea, beverages, and food industries.

name: Groundnuts (Peanuts)
description: High-quality groundnuts from Chad, rich in oil and protein. Ideal for snacking, oil extraction, and food processing.

name: Live Cattle – Chadian Origin
description: Chad is a major livestock country with strong breeds suitable for export and regional trade. Live cattle are available for B2B buyers only.

details.Note: Livestock sales are handled via RFQ and direct contact only.

name: Cattle Hides
description: Cattle Hides from Chad are thick and strong, making them ideal for industrial leather production. They are widely used by tanneries and shoe factories.

name: Sheep Skins (Light & Flexible Leather)
description: Sheep skins are softer and lighter than cow hides. They are highly demanded for fashion and footwear industries.

name: High-Efficiency Solar Panels
description: Durable and high-performance solar panels for residential and commercial use. Available in various wattages.

name: Solar Batteries & Power Storage
description: Deep cycle batteries and power storage solutions to ensure uninterrupted power supply.

name: Solar Inverters & Controllers
description: Advanced solar inverters and charge controllers for efficient energy management.

name: Complete Solar Home Kits
description: All-in-one solar power kits including panels, battery, inverter, and mounting accessories.

name: Solar Accessories (Cables, Mounts)
description: Essential accessories for solar installation including high-quality cables, connectors, and mounting brackets.

name: Mobile Phones & Accessories
description: ChadGlobal Market supplies a wide range of mobile phones and accessories suitable for the African market. We offer bulk and wholesale solutions for distributors, retailers, NGOs, and corporate buyers.

name: TVs & Home Appliances
description: ChadGlobal Market supplies home entertainment and household electronic appliances suitable for residential and commercial use. Our products are energy-efficient and adapted to local voltage and climate conditions.
